name: Armillary Sphere
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

name: Benalish Lancer
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)
If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

name: Bogardan Rager
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

name: Cinder Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."
—Onean sergeant

name: Claws of Valakut
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.
flavor_text: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."

name: Dragon Fodder
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

name: Edge of Autumn
oracle_text:
If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

name: Fiery Fall
oracle_text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

name: Fire-Belly Changeling
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor_text:
"My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns."
—Auntie Wort

name: Ghostfire
oracle_text:
Ghostfire is colorless.
Ghostfire deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

name: Lionheart Maverick
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
oracle_text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

name: Oblivion Ring
oracle_text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Plover Knights
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

name: Seething Song
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: If your flesh can withstand the flame, the spirit of the dragon will burn within your soul.

name: Seismic Strike
oracle_text: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."
—Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

name: Sejiri Steppe
oracle_text:
Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield tapped.
When Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
{T}: Add {W}.

name: Selesnya Sanctuary
oracle_text:
Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}{W}.

name: Sigil Blessing
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and other creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "For unwavering commitment and unflinching strength, the Order of the White Orchid confers its sigil. Rise, knight-captain, and do your duty."

name: Skirk Prospector
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R}.
flavor_text:
"I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Skyhunter Patrol
oracle_text: Flying, first strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"We leonin have come to rule the plains by taking to the skies."
—Raksha Golden Cub

name: Spidersilk Armor
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils

name: Steward of Valeron
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Knight-stewards guard the Sun-Dappled Court, a grove of immense, sculptured olive trees that represent Valeron's twelve noble families.
